About me

Computer Science graduate from Hendrix College, where I fell in love with software development. After graduating I spent the last 4 years working for a non-profit as a campus mentor, creating resources to help students develop towards their personal, academic and professional goals. Since February, I have been refreshing and expanding my skills in software engineering through Zero To Mastery Academy, and DomeTrain focusing on data structures, algorithms, clean code, and web development. I am proficient in Java, Rust, and Javascript and have experience with REST APIs, React, .NET, SQL, and design patterns. I am eager to join a team that will help me grow as a software engineer and contribute to impactful solutions.

Projects

Smart Brain

Full-Stack App with React frontend, NodeJS backend that pulls from the clarifai REST api, and postgresql database. Currently the project has 2 main features... creation and storing of accounts in the database, and face detection given an image.

See Live Source Code

Pathfinder

Uses Breadth-First Search and Depth-First Search algorithms to find the path in a maze. The maze is randomly generated and is guaranteed to have a path. This is completely front-end and uses Javascript.

See Live Source Code
